application.name: 南京银行投票
application.ability: 南京银行宣言投票活动
application.description: 南京银行宣言投票活动
application.author: litseven

manifest.install:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_vivanjyh_xytp`; CREATE TABLE `ims_vivanjyh_xytp` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `numid` varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, `jigou` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `content` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `columns` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '//栏目1经理、2支行、3中行', `time` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_vivanjyh_xytp_num`; CREATE TABLE `ims_vivanjyh_xytp_num` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `uid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `numid` varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, `sittime` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `degree` varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=104 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
